title: Mark Braverman (mathematician)
summary: Mark Braverman (born 1984) is an Israeli mathematician and theoretical computer scientist. He was awarded an EMS Prize in 2016 as well as Presburger Award in the same year.[2][3] In 2019, he was awarded the Alan T. Waterman Award.[4] In 2022 he won the IMU Abacus Medal.[5]
